column1: #text=I must have struck something while riding my bike because it suddenly lost all its pressure .
#text=Upon closer examination , I found a screw in it .
#text=I sighed with frustration and laid the bike on its side .
#text=I took out a wrench , a tube , and a tire tool out of my bag .
#text=I loosened the nut holding the wheel on my bike with the wrench and then undid the rest with my hands .
#text=When the wheel was free , I took the tire tool and wedged it between the wheel and tire to remove the rubber .
#text=I examined the inner tube and it was definitely beyond repair .
#text=I removed the damaged tube and replaced it with the new one .
#text=I put the tire back onto the wheel and pulled the air pin through the hole on the wheel .
#text=I took out my air pump and began to refill the tire with air .
